question:
Consider the following statements about Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme:
  1. The scheme helps to prevent country’s foreign exchange
  2. The bonds are tradable through stock exchanges 
  3. The gold bond can be used as collateral to avail a loan
  4. Capital gain tax will be exempted on redemption
 Which of the above statements are correct?
explanation: All given statements are correctInvesting in the Gold Bond scheme helps as there will be zero risk from handling physical gold. The bonds are tradable through stock exchanges. The gold bond can be used as collateral to avail a loan. Capital gain tax will be exempted on redemption.
